title: How to Fix Analog Sticks on Dual Shock 2 Controller for PS2

steps.title: While the game is active, push in both sticks (thus pressing R3 and L3).
steps.content: While the game is active, push in both sticks (thus pressing R3 and L3 ).

steps.title: While sticks are pressed down, wiggle both sticks in a circular motion for about 5 seconds.
steps.content: While sticks are pressed down, wiggle both sticks in a circular motion for about 5 seconds.

steps.title: Your game should resume as normal.
steps.content: Your game should resume as normal. If the character was moving when you were not touching the controller, this should fix the problem. Just repeat steps 1 & 2 while on title screen (press START ).

steps.title: Check it in your PS2 manual!
steps.content: Check it in your PS2 manual! Every time you start PS2, move analog in a circular motion 1 time, and then your stick will not move itself.
